Skills Summary Strong team-building and organizational skills, excellent mentor. Strong team player with excellent human skills. Core competency in RT system design and data communications. Excellent methodical troubleshooting skills, very strong as a software hardware system integrator BSP. Experience programming in a variety of environments: RT embedded systems, WinCE, Linux, Symbian and Microsoft Windows. Very competent C programmer, experienced in C++. Experienced with ARM, MIPS, PowerPC, PowerQUICC, TI microcontrollers, as well as PC architecture. Special interests in mobile embedded devices, data communications and in wireless technologies. Experience working with JTAG, Code Composer, Oscilloscopes, VSA, ESG, Spectrum analyzer etc.
